channel.title: Artificial intelligence on John's Two Cents
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial intelligence on John's Two Cents

item.title: Dall-E aka artificial intelligent painting
item.description: Welcome back to another blog about artificial intelligence. In case you are a new reader you should definately read the previous blog too about chatGPT, the AI chatbot! You can read it here. Where chatGPT is a chatbot, Dall-E is a digital artisan. By giving it a description of which image you want, Dall-E generates a couple of images for you and I must admit that the results are pretty whopping.

item.title: Hello my name Is Chatgpt!
item.description: Technology is something that is constantly evolving. When you take a look at Gartner’s hypecycle you can see a curve that shows you which technologies are coming our way. You will see a couple of different topics regarding AI, and that’s where todays post is talking about. A big name in this artificial intelligence space is OpenAI thanks to it’s 2 big projects that you can recognize by the names of:
